name: Shinkai: Shopping List Generator
description: Generates a shopping list based on household size, dietary restrictions, and budget.
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: shopping_lists
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE shopping_lists (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, household_size INTEGER NOT NULL, dietary_restrictions TEXT[], budget NUMERIC, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get shopping list by household size
Get latest shopping list
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM shopping_lists ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
